alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 31 at 7:45PM PST until January 01 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Deer Park, Chewelah, Eastport, Ione, Springdale-Hunters Road, Clark Fork, Athol, Kettle Falls, Republic, Bonners Ferry, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Boulder Creek Road, Inchelium, Wauconda, Chesaw Road, Flowery Trail Road, Sandpoint, Northport, Sherman Pass, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Colville, Fruitland, Newport, Tiger, Metaline Falls, Priest River, Metaline, and Orin-Rice Road. * WHEN...Until noon PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
